mapper.select: SELECT COURSE_NAME, CREDIT, UNIVERSITY, PROFESSOR, MAJOR, COURSE_ROOM, COURSE_YEAR, NUM_OF_STUDENT, CTIME FROM COURSE WHERE COURSE_NUMBER=#{course_number}
SELECT COURSE_NUMBER , SEMESTER , STAR_POINT , COURSE_REVIEW ,PROFESSOR ,COURSE_NAME FROM REVIEW WHERE COURSE_NAME=#{course_name} AND PROFESSOR=#{professor}
SELECT COURSE_NAME, COURSE_NUMBER, CREDIT, UNIVERSITY, PROFESSOR, MAJOR FROM COURSE

SELECT COUNT(C.COURSE_NAME) AS CNT FROM (SELECT COURSE_NAME,COUNT(COURSE_NAME) FROM COURSE WHERE 1=1
AND COURSE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') AND COURSE_NUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') AND PROFESSOR LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') AND MAJOR LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') AND UNIVERSITY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') AND CREDIT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') AND COURSE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR COURSE_NUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR PROFESSOR LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR MAJOR LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR UNIVERSITY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR CREDIT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
GROUP BY COURSE_NAME,PROFESSOR,MAJOR ) AS C
